name: HODL FOR PEACE (UKR edit)
description:
HOLD PEACE! HODL FOR PEACE! 
Instant cryptoart seri-graphies 
(unique editions)
#HODL4PEACE #TRA$H4PEACE #WACA
...
In support for our civilian Ukrainian friends, we want to use this donation contract that will redirect tezos to multiple charity orgs in support of Ukraine relief, and we want to help support this initiative. 
In an easiest way, we engage to donate all sales income to the related organisation adress:
KT1DWnLiUkNtAQDErXxudFEH63JC6mqg3HEx (aliak-ukraine-collab)
we will post all transactions hash on twitter with tag and buyer's mention.
More info here: https://github.com/teia-community/teia-docs/wiki/Ukranian-Fundraising
